alert.note: Alert for Buckeye, Avondale; Cave Creek, New River; Central Phoenix; Deer Valley; North Phoenix, Glendale; Northwest Valley; Scottsdale, Paradise Valley; Sonoran Desert Natl Monument; Tonopah Desert (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 18 at 8:21PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Maricopa County through 900 PM MST... At 819 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking clusters of strong thunderstorms over Glendale and west parts of the Phoenix metro. These storms were nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Phoenix, Glendale, Peoria, Surprise, Avondale, Goodyear, Buckeye, El Mirage, Tolleson, Youngtown, Laveen, Sun City, Litchfield Park, Palo Verde and Papago Park. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 101 and 150. AZ Interstate 17 between mile markers 195 and 221. AZ Route 51 between mile markers 1 and 15. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Buckeye, Avondale; Cave Creek, New River; Central Phoenix; Deer Valley; North Phoenix, Glendale; Northwest Valley; Scottsdale, Paradise Valley; Sonoran Desert Natl Monument; Tonopah Desert
